overview: Jonathan Crabtree is a lateral thinker pursuing interests in communications, technology innovation and mathematics for the purpose of social justice. ===== Jonathan Crabtree Born April 24 1961 Former world record holder for human memory. Internet technology futurist. World peace campaigner and advocate for a war on starvation - not just drugs, terror and global warming. Campaigner for the homeless during the ‘global financial crisis. Naive Mathematician Creator of Podometic and AHA Numerals - the first major innovation in number systems since the popularisation of Hindu-Arabic numerals. Lives Australia
